title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press the 'Finish' button on the JAR packager wizard, it fails to create the JAR file and displays the error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: The JAR packager reports open files very late and fails to create the JAR file when there are unsaved editors.
EB: I expect to be able to create a JAR file even with unsaved editors. If there are unsaved editors, there should be a dialog that prompts me to save them before proceeding with the JAR creation.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the JAR packager wizard.
2. Add some files to be included in the JAR.
3. Modify the content of one of the opened files, but do not save the changes.
4. Click on the 'Finish' button.
5. Observe the error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
